funcs.description: Get a 2d perlin noise value. Increase the x and y parameters by a small amount (eg, 0.01) at each step to get a smooth noise.
funcs.name: perlin2d
param: x, y optional x and y dimension, or leave empty to use this vector's x and y position

funcs.description: Get a 2d simplex noise value. Increase the x and y parameters by a small amount (eg, 0.01) at each step to get a smooth noise.
funcs.name: simplex2d
param: x, y optional x and y dimension, or leave empty to use this vector's x and y position
